Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is partially covered with a yellow deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T25 Wall 54
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393605) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393605)
